backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing users, episodes, characters, clans, gallery items, news posts, and scripts with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping episode‑related frontend features to the files implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of textual summaries describing purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that switches between the main site and admin dashboard using hash-based routing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gatekeeper component that checks identity and admin status to show login, unauthorized message, or the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard layout with tabbed panels for managing episodes, characters, clans, gallery, news, scripts, and team content.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Admin panel for listing, creating, editing, and deleting characters with metadata encoding and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Admin UI to manage clans, including creation, editing, deletion, and metadata handling for descriptions.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Panel for CRUD operations on episodes, supporting metadata for number/status and media fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Admin interface for managing gallery items with image upload, preview, metadata, and CRUD dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Simple admin panel for creating, editing, and deleting news posts with title and content fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Admin panel to list, create, edit, and delete scripts using form dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Admin panel for managing team members, granting and revoking roles, with permission checks and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and automatic error recovery.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays a character card with animated styling, clan‑based colors, and personality/power/role details.
Renders a small animated badge showing a clan’s name and accent color.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Visual clan card with animations, sigil image, badge, and description.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Episode preview card showing title, number, status, summary, and optional watch button.
Dialog that displays an episode’s video player or a missing‑video alert.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Renders a filterable gallery grid with category tabs and image click handling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Provides a fullscreen lightbox with navigation, keyboard controls, and image details.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Implements an image upload dialog with drag‑and‑drop, validation, metadata encoding, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form for creating news posts with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Displays a single news post with formatted timestamp, author, and content.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated about section showcasing key features with icons and scroll‑reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Loads and displays character cards with metadata decoding, loading states, and scroll animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Displays animated clan cards, loading backend clans when available and falling back to static data with styling metadata.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Renders a scroll-revealed episode list with backend-loaded metadata, watch handling, and an episode player dialog.
Provides a scroll-revealed footer with branding, quick navigation, and social links, with motion reductions respected.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Shows a gallery grid with backend metadata, lightbox navigation, and an admin upload option with scroll-triggered animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Implements a responsive header with scroll effects, section navigation, mobile menu, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates an animated parallax hero section with particles, layered backgrounds, and stylized title content.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Renders the news section with post listing, profile setup, and admin post creation logic using multiple hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines the Character interface and exports a list of detailed character profiles with clans, abilities, and roles.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines the Clan interface and exports metadata for each clan including descriptions, colors, and sigil paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Defines Episode structure and provides the Season 1 episode list with summaries and release status.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item types and exports a small set of gallery entries and category names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refetches dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a parallax scrolling hook that applies transform effects unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced‑motion preference using a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, episodes, characters, and related backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Implements an intersection‑observer hook to reveal elements on scroll, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom utilities including glow effects, gradients, and cinematic animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
Provides helpers to encode/decode metadata into text fields for clans, characters, episodes, and gallery items, plus styling lookup.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates image uploads for type and size and converts valid files to data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, container settings, shadows, and other theme utilities with custom clan and UI tokens.
project_state.json: Stores the project's versioned state, including the overall site vision, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features. Acts as a central reference for design direction, structure, and current progress.
